title: Magic and Machinery
blurb: Sarah, a modern-day engineer, finds herself teleported to a parallel world where magic is real. Enrolling in a prestigious magical school, she begins to learn the basics of magic. Combining her technical knowledge with newfound magical abilities, she revolutionizes the society with magi tech, leading to unforeseen impacts on the world.
back_cover_text: Sarah Davis, a brilliant engineer from Earth, is abruptly teleported to a fantastical parallel world where magic is not only real but integral to life. Initially bewildered, Sarah discovers a prestigious magical school, Aurelia Academy, and decides to enroll to learn the fundamentals of magic as a means to survive and find a way back home. As she dives deeper into the mysteries of magic, her engineering acumen sparks a revolutionary idea - combining Earth's technology with magic to create magi tech. Through trials and tribulations, Sarah's innovations start shaping the society around her, introducing unprecedented changes and unlocking potentials previously thought unattainable. However, with great power comes great responsibility, and Sarah must navigate the challenges and ethical dilemmas that arise from her newfound influence.
